ANIMAL ABUSE!! This is the worst place ever. They charge 45000 per person but they can't afford a decent place for their animals in their zoo?
Syrian hamsters caged all together, they fight, they get raped one and another and another time. Nobody cares because there is nobody taking care of them. Poor conditions, hamsters with anxiety symptoms, raccoons stressed out, turtles with no water, snakes and monkeys with no trees to climb and many more.
I DONT RECOMMEND THIS PLACE AT ALL. IT MUST BE CLOSED!!
왜 사람들이 안오는지 기본적인것부터 다시 생각해보시길 권유드립니다. 손님이 적은 평일이라지만 톱질하고 페인트칠하고 안전관리는 없고

Honestly, this place should just get rid of its zoo. Raccoons in a small cage with old spider web adhered to its cover with a pile of shit, two monkeys in a small cage with their own pile of shit, golden hamsters left in a group--they are solitary animals--and the list literally goes on and on. Just try visiting the zoo here and leave your own review. You'll understand what I mean.
